ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] shoulders...
ygData.msgSnippet: For me: Sentry Pauldrons +12 AC +2 Strength +2 Agility +2 Dexterity +3 Magic Resist +5 Mana Not sure what a songshawl is, but it sounds way cool Cyr, Thierry
ygData.messageBody:
For me:
Sentry Pauldrons +12 AC +2 Strength +2 Agility +2 Dexterity +3 Magic Resist +5 Mana
Not sure what a songshawl is, but it sounds way cool
"Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...> wrote: Just curious, i became the happy owner of a songshawl last night, and was
wondering what other high level bards are using as a shoulderpiece... could
i be looking for a better shoulderpiece out there?

Minkin
Ayonae Ro
